Hawk launched the 56m Cape Hawk and the 75m Sky Hawk at the Boot Dusseldorf, both of which received impressive attention from the media and potential clients. A selection of online press can be found below.

CHARTERWORLD

"The unique explorers by Hawk Yachts are vessels that go further and do more for the new breed of owners not content with the status quo"

Charterworld »

SUPERYACHT DESIGN

"The Hawk Yachts distinctive bow shape seeks to tie together beauty and functionality, protecting systems from the wear and tear expected in heavy seas as well as being designed to push through smaller pieces of ice and pack ice"

Superyacht Design »

YACHTING INFO

"Based on the philosophy of beauty and function, the 56m Cape Hawk and the 75m Sky Hawk are both designed to go further and do more”

Yachting Info »

BOATSHOW AVENUE

"Both explorers are designed to offer deluxe and comfortable accommodation to 12 guests. In addition, they provide all the luxury amenities of a superyacht, including indoor/outdoor dining, beach club, spa, large sun areas, large garage for a great variety of water toys, and even guest expedition preparation rooms and a science lab."

Boatshow Avenue »

Boatshow Avenue YouTube »

JACK TAR

"it this practical experience that leads to highly functional sea-worthy vessels like those that Hawk Yachts are launching here"

Jack Tar Superyacht Charter »
